None.Name: Infused Battling
None.Description: Infuses an enemy unit with the art of cunning warfare: if it dies within the next 15 seconds, out of its remains a 20m summoning zone will be created. Friendly units spawned within that zone will not be dazed. Additionally, every friendly entity within it deals 25% more damage against structures. The zone lasts for 13 seconds. Reusable every 20 seconds.
